title: Shens spiritual blade and Sennas magical BFG
body: Shens spiritual blade attacks can hurt the spirit of living beings while Sennas BFG does the opposite? It might doing so, but I would like a reasonable answer behind this.

replies.body: Senna's gun has two barrels, one light, one dark. The light Senna fires can heal, thanks in part to her curse (which ironically is life, spoilers for the bio). Lucian can't heal with his guns. Shen can't heal with his blade.

> [{quoted}](name=Interlocutioner,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=swcst77p,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-10-16T18:02:18.980+0000)
>
> Senna's gun has two barrels, one light, one dark. The light Senna fires can heal, thanks in part to her curse (which ironically is life, spoilers for the bio). Lucian can't heal with his guns. Shen can't heal with his blade.

So... Shen does not shield himself and other by stabbing them with his blade? 

.... Headcanon deconfirmed
Uh, I actually shouldn't speak about Shen too much, just trying to clarify why Senna can heal! Head canon away (that actually sounds cool.)

Let me guess... Gonna learn more about him in the Zed comic, yeah?
Or are you guys planning something else for Shen?
Whoever has plans for him, it isn't me, is what I'm trying to say. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}  But I can speak to Senna.

Probably Odin.

But yeah, Senna is a weird experience for me. I joined a few years after Lucian was released, so I didn't spend years wanting her to be a champion or anything. I just knew she was dead, and that Thresh did it and now Lucian hates him.

But Senna is here now, and as August(or I guess October, does he change his name every month?) said, QUEEN.
I'm so excited to play her.

So, just to clarify.

Senna has her own soul, and another, undying soul that latched onto her when she first encountered the mist.

Her own soul is dead, giving her death powers, while the undying soul gives her life powers.  Right?

> [{quoted}](name=Interlocutioner,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=swcst77p,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-10-16T18:15:43.472+0000)
>
> Whoever has plans for him, it isn't me, is what I'm trying to say. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}  But I can speak to Senna.

please, can you explain what is relic stone (and how is it related to souls)?
And also I do not understand the power of senna (life?)
I did not really understand this biography, but I would love to understand it because senna looks great
The Relic stone is a gun made of a bunch of other guns like Lucian's.  She built it while in the Lantern.
How tho. What's it like in the lantern like a pokeball?

>Shen can't heal with his blade.

Oh yeah? Then how do you explain Surgeon Shen?
He hits them so hard with his blade it crosses over into healing them.
Soo is this second soul attached to her a darkin? Its darkin right? Right?
